content: onto my smaller needle then knitting the two stitches together using my larger needle step 1 pick up the first cast on step 2 place the picked up cast on stitch with larger right needle stitch onto your smaller left needle repeat these 3 steps until all 120 live stitches and all 120 cast on stitches step 3 using your larger right have been knit together this is what needle knit the two stitches together the inside of your brim will look like body continuing with your larger 16 4mm needles knit until the length measures 6 inches from folded brim edge starting at the beginning of round begin knitting with your cc until the length of beanie measures 7 inches or longer if you want more slouch from folded brim edge decreases set up your decrease row by placing removable stitch markers every 20 stitches 6 markers total one is your beginning of round marker row 1 *knit until 2 stitches before marker k2tog slip marker* repeat to the end of round repeat this decrease row until you have 6 stitches left on your needles cut your working yarn leaving a couple of inches to thread through your 6 live stitches copyright 2020 aleah nishizaki january 2020 - version 1 0 weave in all ends block if desired and add a fun pom pom optional this pattern is for private use please create a ravelry project page for only this pattern may not be sold your warm honey beanie so others can copied or given to any other party be inspired by your version and share without the written consent of the your progress and finished photos by designer products made may be using the hashtag #warmhoneybeanie on sold instagram
